doc.field: A RM f1020reute r f BC-SOUTHEAST-BANKING-ST 04-01 0085
SOUTHEAST BANKING STB> FILES FOR NOTE OFFERING

Southeast Banking Corp said it filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission a registration statement covering a 50 mln dlr issue of convertible subordinated capital notes due 1999. The notes are designed to qualify as primary capital for Federal Reserve Board regulatory purposes, the bank said. It will apply to list the notes on the New York Stock Exchange. The company named Lazard Freres and Co as lead manager of the deal. Reuter
